content: Investments Bonds General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Jul 2019How do I sell the Temasek bonds in my CDP account?I brought the Temasek bonds previously via applying through my dbs account. Now, I am in need of a bit of cash and wants to sell it. I have a CDP account but I am not sure how to sell the bond. Do I need to open a brokerage account for this? What's a quick way to sell the bonds?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 08 Jul 2019You'll need to open a CDP linked brokerage account in order to sell them.0 comments5
